name: Journals of the Unknown: Hidden Objects
name_original: Journals of the Unknown: Hidden Objects
description:
Uncover the mysteries from beyond.

Get ready to help Jane Goodhart solve a series of intriguing cases by using your detective skills to find hidden objects, decipher puzzles, gather clues and explore locations in this thrilling adventure game.

Jane has just been appointed as the director of 'Amazing' magazine. This publication was founded by her father, a renowned journalist focused on uncovering the secrets of the unknown who mysteriously disappeared recently in the Bermuda Triangle. While still in grief, Jane decides to take on her first case: a mysterious new witch hunt has begun in the town of Salem. What she doesn't know is that this mission will change her life forever.

Embark on a quest to find Jane's missing father following the storyline by completing episodes and solving cases. Test your skills and challenge your friends in Hidden Object scenes with varying modes, while you uncover the secrets that lie in worlds beyond. It is your fate to fill the blank pages the Journals of the Unknown.
